title: Google Docs Collaborative Editing
description: Fix lagging while typing, 'Trying to reconnect' banners, and formatting bugs.

steps.title: Check Reconnection Banner
steps.instruction: If you see 'Trying to reconnect', stop typing immediately. Your changes are NOT being saved. Wait for the signal to return.

steps.title: Disable Ad-Blockers
steps.instruction: Ad-blockers often mistake Google Docs scripts for trackers. Disable them for drive.google.com and docs.google.com.

steps.title: Limit Number of Collaborators
steps.instruction: If 50+ people are in one doc, it will lag. Ask others to close the tab if they aren't actively editing.

steps.title: Clear Document Version History
steps.instruction: Large docs with thousands of edits get slow. File → Make a copy to start a fresh file without the massive edit history.

steps.title: Update Chrome Browser
steps.instruction: Docs uses the latest web engines. Ensure Chrome is up to date via 'Help → About Google Chrome'.
